Bacterial Spot: Use Copper-based fungicides and apply balanced NPK fertilizer (19:19:19).
Powdery Mildew: Apply Sulfur-based sprays and give Potassium-rich fertilizer (MOP).
Shot Hole: Spray Captan fungicide and provide Calcium Nitrate for stronger leaves.
Shot Hole Leaf: Use Mancozeb fungicide and add balanced compost or Vermicompost.
Yellow Leaf: Apply Urea for nitrogen boost and Zinc Sulfate if deficiency is observed.
